text: Efficient generation of FAP-specific iPS cells by SeV vectors.
(A) ALP staining of cells growing on 100-mm dishes.
(B) RT-PCR analysis of expression of NANOG, TERT, SeV, and β-actin.
iPS-1 to iPS-10 are established clones.
(C) Typical staining of FAP-specific iPS cell colonies with anti-SeV antibodies.
The colony was partially positive (left panel) and negative (right panel) for SeV. BC, bright contrast.
(D) Immunostaining of established clones with pluripotency marker Oct3/4 (green).
